document_data.name: Mesquite
document_data.mainbody: '''Mesquite''' was a type of tree found in the Forgotten Realms.
document_data.Description: Mesquite trees had roots that could grow down over a {{SI|100|ft}} into the earth, tapping into the deepest reaches of water. In desert regions, such as Anauroch, these extensive networks helped to stabilize sand dunes and hold them in place against the wind.
document_data.Habitats:
* Mesquite was known to grow in the deserts of [[Anauroch]].
* Mesquite was known to grow in the land of [[Maztica]].
document_data.Usage:
* The [[Azuposi]] people of Maztica were known to burn mesquite, using it as either a fuel source or a healing [[incense]].
* In the land of Anauroch, mesquite trees were the primary fuel source of the [[Bedine]] tribes.
* Mesquite was one of many types of firewood that [[halfling]]s were known to be proficient in utilizing.
